name: 陳圳卿
objective:
本課程在視覺心理學的架構下，從設計的角度來檢視視覺、知覺、心理物理學、心理實驗學與視錯覺等的基礎理論與設計應用。
This course investigates the fundamental theories of visual perception through the lens of design. Topics include vision, perceptual process, space perception, psychophysics, and visual illusion.
